about_the_game:
The Hentai Waifu - Original soundtrack is a pack with all the 8 Original tracks made for the game. Now you can relax with the songs of the game while doing anything else!

  • New Memories in F# - 4:27
  • Piccolo Pezzo in Mi Maggiore - 5:21
  • New Small Guitar Piece - 4:27
  • Cookies - 5:41
  • Selection - 3:29
  • Sfumato - 4:23
  • Travel - 5:25
  • Hentai Waifu - Trailer Song - 1:11

The Songs are on MP3 format and can be found on the game's folder.
'\Steam\steamapps\common\Hentai Waifu\Soundtrack'

content_descriptors.notes: This is a game made for adult audience, it contains nudity.
